title: Extending the Table: A Guide for a Ministry of Home Communion Serving
features: This Holy Mystery: A United Methodist Understanding of Holy Communion
. Stamm offers very practical suggestions for inclusion of all people in the receiving of the sacrament.
description: Mark W. Stamm is Assistant Professor of Christian Worship at Perkins School of Theology, Southern Methodist University (Dallas, TX), and former pastor of Trinity United Methodist Church in Roaring Spring, PA, as well as rural churches in Kentucky and Pennsylvania. Abbot of the Order of Saint Luke, he has taught pastors and laity in a wide variety of annual conference, retreat, and congregational settings.
